param.name: dwRPNum
param.para: The sequence number of the restore point.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS.
If the specified restore point does not exist or cannot be removed, the return value is ERROR_INVALID_DATA. All other error codes indicate an internal error.

remarks.para: Applications should not call System Restore functions using load-time dynamic linking. Instead, use the function to load SrClient.dll and to call the function.
